channel.title: Lawsuit on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Lawsuit on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Feds try to dodge lawsuit against their bogus climate report
item.description: Meanwhile, Congress is trying to keep serious scientists from weighing in.

item.title: Anthropic Agrees to Pay Authors at Least $1.5 Billion in AI Copyright Settlement
item.description: Anthropic will pay at least $3,000 for each copyrighted work that it pirated. The company downloaded unauthorized copies of books in early efforts to gather training data for its AI tools.
